test_message: A cat was found with an open leg wound, limping badly, showing visible signs of pain. Location coordinates: 19.0760, 72.8777. Classify urgency, create case ticket, and notify nearest available doctors within 5km radius.

result.analysis: The cat has an open wound on its leg, is limping, and is visibly in pain. This requires urgent medical attention to prevent infection and alleviate the pain.
recommendations: Medical evaluation for possible infection and further injury treatment
